meanings.definition: A mixture or jumble of things.
meanings.sent1: The hotchpot of toys on the floor made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: She stirred the hotchpot of ingredients in the pot to make soup.
meanings.sent3: The hotchpot of colors in the painting created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His room was a hotchpot of books, clothes, and toys, like a mini library.
meanings.sent5: The hotchpot of flavors in the dish exploded in her mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: The combining of assets or property for equal distribution among heirs.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer explained the hotchpot process to the family to ensure fair inheritance.
meanings.sent2: Before dividing the estate, they had to go through the hotchpot of assets.
meanings.sent3: The hotchpot of family heirlooms caused some confusion among the siblings.
meanings.sent4: The hotchpot of investments was split evenly among the beneficiaries.
meanings.sent5: The hotchpot of properties was shared among the relatives according to the will.
